I am currently studying Japanese history at University and was wondering wh=
o out of the three unifiers Oda Nobunaga, Toyotomi Hideyoshi and Tokugawa I=
eyasu was more militarily astute and could be crowned as the ultimate milit=
ary leader amongst the three? Are there any examples to suggest why either =
is the ultimate unifier because of their military conquests? Also what mili=
tary conquests and battles highlight the Sengoku periods including these th=
ree daimyo? 

Help would be much appreciated... Cheers!
